channel.title: Parallel on Leonardo Benicio
channel.description: Recent content in Parallel on Leonardo Benicio

item.title: Introduction to Parallel Computing (2nd ed.)
item.description: A comprehensive textbook on models, algorithms, and performance analysis for parallel computing.

item.title: Parallel Programming in C with MPI and OpenMP
item.description: Introductory yet practical coverage of parallel programming in C using both MPI and OpenMP.

item.title: Patterns for Parallel Programming
item.description: Pattern-based approach to structuring parallel programs across shared and distributed memory.
